name: Blobcano (BLANKdev)
description:
Blobcano! 

A Game about some happy little blobs just trying to get home, unfortunately for them the Volcano they live in,  Mt. Butcher, has just erupted! Can you help them fly away to victory?

Devlog:

Controls: 

  • W - Flap upwards
  • A/D - Move side to side
  • R - Reset if you get trapped!
Credits:

Everything made by me in the 7 day time-limit, apart the music/some sound effects:

  • Music made with an AI-Generator 'Strofe': https://www.strofe.com/create

No Changes Made

  • Saw sound: https://freesound.org/people/Mikaaku_Hoshine/sounds/241805/
  • Blob Flap : https://freesound.org/people/AgentDD/sounds/246224/
  • Bounce: https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446100/
  • Coin Collect: https://freesound.org/people/ash_rez/sounds/518888/

Changes Made

  • Piston, I cut a clip out of the provided sound: https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/185161/
  • Volcano Start, I cut out the beginning and made it shorter: https://freesound.org/people/eardeer/sounds/402004/
  • Spike Death, Cut out the beginning and made it shorter: https://freesound.org/people/Killersmurf96/sounds/423130/
  • Lava Death, Cut out the beginning and made it shorter: https://freesound.org/people/MrVasLuk/sounds/304619/
Any Bugs?
  • SFX will cut out when too many things are happening, whoops!

The fps seems to take a big hit on the WebGL build, if it doesn't look nice and smooth then something is wrong so please let me know.

Thanks for playing, I hope you enjoy and best of luck to everyone in the jam. Happy Coding Everyone!
